biotools.summary: ProMoST (Protein Modification Screening Tool) is a program to calculate accurate MW and pI values from proteins considering the effects of post-translational modifications.  Results are displayed as calculated values of pI and MW for each protein and are also plotted on two-dimensional (2D) gel images.

bioschemas.name: ProMoST
